gameplay.note:
Phoenix Force - Passive  
 
The Phoenix's connection to the cosmic Phoenix Force entity is the source of much of her power. She begins the fight with 1 Phoenix Force charge, and periodically generates Fury Buffs based on her current number of Phoenix Force Charges.    
  
Fury Buffs increase Attack by 7.5%    
  
Empowered - 5 or more Fury Buffs   
All attacks gain 100% chance to Incinerate the opponent, dealing 7% of her Attack as Energy Damage over 6 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% when it's active.   
   
Heavy Attacks gain 100% chance to Armor Break, reducing Armor by 30% for 7 seconds.    
  
Overloaded - 11 Fury Buffs  
 
On entering Overload all Phoenix Force charges are immediately consumed, and the Phoenix begins to consume Fury Buffs periodically.   
    
All attacks have a 20% chance to Stun Incinerated targets.   
   
Offensive and Defensive Power Gain is reduced by 80%.   
   
On reaching 0 Fury Charges, the Phoenix stops Overloading and generates 1 Phoenix Force charge.

signature.name: Right of the Phoenix
signature.description: Once per fight when the Phoenix would be knocked out, she immediately becomes invulnerable for 2 seconds, and consumes all of her Phoenix Force charges, regaining 7.3 health per charge. After which she gains 1 Phoenix Force charge.
